original_title: Walt Disney World 25th Anniversary (Remembering the Magic)
overview: It’s the biggest party since the “World” began, 15 months of special events, one of a kind entertainment, and new attractions at all three theme parks!  The 25th-anniversary Parade at the Magic Kingdom, Mickey’s Tune town fair, Illuminations 25, the new Boardwalk resort, a backstage look at the new 101 dalmatians movie, Epcot’s Test Track, The Hunchback of Notre Dame live on stage, new restaurants and shops and Cinderella Castle transformed into a 185-foot tall birthday cake!!!  It can only be the 25th anniversary of Walt Disney World, and it’s time to Remember the Magic!  Regis Philbin is our host for this televised special commemorating the 25th anniversary of Disney World.  Remembering the Magic, Walt Disney World, The First Twenty-Five Years.  With interviews from Roy Disney, Marty Sklar, Card Walker, Dick Nunis, and John Hench it’s a wonderful look back with some of the people that worked with Walt Disney and finished his dream the Florida Project.
title: Walt Disney World 25th Anniversary (Remembering the Magic)
